item.title: Features
item.description: Play Chess completely within Slack. Get notified when it is your turn. Games are contained within Slack threads, which prevents spamming the channel. After the game is over, learn from your mistakes by using a computer analysis import. Socialize and have fun with your peers!

item.title: Interacting with ChessBot
item.description: Challenge a fellow colleague Go to a channel where the ChessBot has joined and issue a challenge: The player will receive the challenge message from ChessBot: When accepted, it will start the game as a thread to the original challenge message: Issuing Moves ChessBot can “hear” moves as grid positions. The board is labeled 1-9 and a-h, so to move the queen pawn up 2 squares, the move position would be d2d4.
